author: martinamalberti
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds to the MtdTracksValidation class histograms for the computation of the fraction of tracks with time with correctly matched reco hit in MTD.

#### PR validation:
Code compiles, runs and produces expected results. Tested on 
- wf 29607.0 
- /RelValMinBias_14TeV/CMSSW_14_2_0_pre4-141X_mcRun4_realistic_v3_STD_RegeneratedGS_2026D110_noPU-v1/GEN-SIM-RECO
title: MTD Validation: add efficiency plots for correct reco match
